If you have small children you will need life jackets for the lake since there is not a easily accessible beach area and it is deep at the dock. But that is the only thing I would suggest or ensure a family knows who is coming in. Our grandson is 6 and did fine with the water since he can swim well and had a life jacket as well.
The paddle board is great and our grandson loved it along with our grown children.
Bring a float and just relax. The water is smooth and so relaxing since there is not a lot of boats back in the cove. You can relax and enjoy the peace and quiet. And you are only 5 mins by car or boat to the marina. We were able to bring a boat and left it at the dock the entire stay.
Teresa is a great host and she was quick to respond to all of my questions before and during our trip.
The house has all of the amenities you will need for cooking, grilling etc.
We highly recommend this home for a long wkd or family get away.
The neighborhood is also very safe and nice. You will not be disappointed.
